name: 富士山 Fuji
description:
Souvenirs extra. I just wanted to see Mount Fuji.
 You can see Mt. Fuji with me through this link: https://www.google.com.ar/maps/@35.2533517,138.7856217,3a,45y,349.77h,90.7t/data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1sAF1QipPYAxe7iox_cNQOeTYeE4zcmZZR1c2m1VROTCeC!2e10!3e11!6shttps:%2F%2Flh5.googleusercontent.com%2Fp%2FAF1QipPYAxe7iox_cNQOeTYeE4zcmZZR1c2m1VROTCeC%3Dw203-h100-k-no-pi0-ya30.886421-ro0-fo100!7i5000!8i2500
The visualized piece is part of a series of drawings made during the mandatory quarantine phase 1 of the COVID-19 virus pandemic. During that period I found it impossible to travel and see family, friends and relatives, so I used google street view to walk the streets of my neighborhood and my hometown. I wanted to go further and went to Japan. I started to travel around Japan, rural areas, mountains, until I reached the center of Tokyo. And while I was drawing I was thinking if this virtual reality would become memories?
